hossam.name: Hossam Uddin
hossam.description: Hossam is a 3rd year student studying Mathematics and Statistics at Queen Mary University of London. Prior to his studies, Hossam took a gap year where he interned at PwC for 6 months in Tax. Last summer he interned as trading analyst at Royal Bank of Canada. In his first year at QMUL, Hossam completed a spring week at JP Morgan, and a summer internship at HSBC in Wealth Management and Commercial Banking. Outside of his studies, Hossam plays cricket at a competitive level and enjoys reading fiction. For inquiries, please contact via email.

pattawia.name: Pattawia Supradit
pattawia.description: Pattawia is a 3rd year student in the BSc Economics & Finance programme with Excellence Scholarship awarded by the School at Queen Mary. She is currently interning in Global Markets with Nomura, London with different rotations from FX Sales, Risk Solutions Group (IBD) and Asian Equities Sales. In her 2nd year of university, she was the president of Thai Society at QM as well as the Secretary of QMTIS. She also did her summer internship with BNP Paribas in Financial Institutions Coverage (FIC) and FICC Sales and Trading. Patty will be organising events, our mentorship programme and overlooking the finances of QMTIS. For any enquiries contact Pattawia via email.

ryan.name: Ryan Gumbrell
ryan.description: Ryan is a 3rd year Economics student. He has had two internships during his undergraduate degree. One in a global asset manager, Old Mutual, and the other in a boutique, Asia-focused fund. He has been with QMTIS since joining Queen Mary in 2015 and is now our Head of Investments.

daniil.name: Daniil Kolodkin
daniil.description: Daniil is a 3rd year Mathematics with Finance and Accounting student. He is the chess captain in the QMUL Chess Society. Having traded different asset classes since 14 years old and now managing a portfolio, Daniil has gained a significant understanding of the financial markets. Formerly he has interned in Prime Brokerage in Otkritie Capital in London and has received experience in Trinnacle Capital Management, which is a big data Hedge Fund based in New-York. Daniil will be the Head of the FX team under the investment group. For any enquiries about joining the FX group contact Daniil via email.

daniel.name: Daniel Yehuda
daniel.description: Daniel is a 3rd year student in the BSc Economics programme at Queen Mary. He has interned at Commerzbank and Allianz in London and is now interning at XL Catlin. In charge of the macroeconomic research division of QMTIS, his role includes organising the macro research team and informing the wider society about macroeconomic shocks. For any enquiries about available roles within the macro research team, contact Daniel via email.

damodara.name: Damodara Puddu
damodara.description: 2nd year BSc Computer Science student at Queen Mary University of London. He is engaged in projects and research covering Data Science, Quants and Big Data. His tech team will be responsible for organising events in the Fintech space, researching and keeping up to date with related news and mentoring members that want to get into the industry. For inquiries, please contact via email.
